recommendation.title: Recommendation
recommendation.zero: Zero Commission offers simplicity with no commission fees
recommendation.raw: Raw account saves you ${{savings}}/month with lower total costs

items.question: Which account should I choose?
items.answer: We recommend Zero Commission for most traders - simple, transparent pricing with no surprises. Perfect for beginners and those who prefer predictable costs. Raw Account is better for very high-volume traders (50+ lots monthly) who can benefit from tighter spreads despite the commission structure.

items.question: Why is Zero Commission better for most people?
items.answer: Zero Commission offers complete transparency - what you see is what you pay. No complex commission calculations, no surprises. The all-in spread pricing makes it easier to calculate your trading costs and perfect for learning to trade.

items.question: Are there hidden fees?
items.answer: No. Pricing is transparent. Costs are spread-based (Zero Commission) or spread + commission (Raw). Swaps are free on all accounts.

items.question: Can I change account type later?
items.answer: Yes—contact support and we'll guide you through it.

items.question: Do both work on MT5?
items.answer: Yes, on desktop, web, and mobile.

items.question: What about deposits & withdrawals?
items.answer: We support trusted local/global methods. See details in our payment methods section.

pricingModel.title: Pricing Model
pricingModel.zero: All costs included in the spread. No additional commissions charged.
pricingModel.raw: Raw spreads from liquidity providers plus a transparent commission per lot.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about MT5

free.question: Is MT5 free to use?
free.answer: Yes. The platform is completely free to download and use. Trading costs depend on your chosen account type (spreads and commissions).

accounts.question: Which account types work with MT5?
accounts.answer: Both Zero Commission and Raw account types are fully compatible with MT5 desktop, web, and mobile versions.

eas.question: Can I run Expert Advisors (EAs)?
eas.answer: Yes, on desktop and web versions. Enable algorithmic trading in settings and review EA risks. Mobile versions don't support EAs.

devices.question: How do I switch between devices?
devices.answer: Simply log in on any device using the same server name and account credentials. Your trades and settings sync automatically.

server.question: Where do I find my server details?
server.answer: Server information is provided in your welcome email or Account Dashboard. You can also copy it from the Setup wizard below.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions

free.question: Is MT5 free to use?
free.answer: Yes. The platform is completely free to download and use. Trading costs depend on your chosen account type (spreads and commissions).

accountTypes.question: Which account types work with MT5?
accountTypes.answer: Both Zero Commission and Raw account types are fully compatible with MT5 desktop, web, and mobile versions.

eas.question: Can I run Expert Advisors (EAs)?
eas.answer: Yes, on desktop and web versions. Enable algorithmic trading in settings and review EA risks. Mobile versions don't support EAs.

multiDevice.question: How do I switch between devices?
multiDevice.answer: Simply log in on any device using the same server name and account credentials. Your trades and settings sync automatically.

serverDetails.question: Where do I find my server details?
serverDetails.answer: Server information is provided in your welcome email or Account Dashboard. You can also copy it from the Setup wizard below.

feeEstimator.title: Fee Estimator
feeEstimator.description: Calculate estimated fees and net amounts for your transactions

disclaimer.title: Estimates Only
disclaimer.text: Excludes third-party or FX conversion fees unless shown. Final amounts may vary based on provider rates and currency conversion.

validation.validAmount: Enter a valid amount to see fee estimation

descriptions.visionExpress: Fast local payment service in Lebanon

items.question: Card deposit declined
items.answer: Try another card, check 3-D Secure is enabled, or contact your bank to allow online payments.

items.question: Bank transfer missing
items.answer: Double-check the reference code, allow 1-3 business days, and send your transfer slip to support if needed.

items.question: Withdrawal pending
items.answer: Check your KYC verification status, account ownership details, and note that processing may be delayed on weekends.

items.question: What are the fees?
items.answer: We show our fees upfront in the matrix below. Banks and payment providers may add their own fees.

items.question: How long do transactions take?
items.answer: From instant to a few business days depending on the method and your location.

items.question: Do I need verification?
items.answer: Yes - requirements depend on the method and transaction limits you need.

overviewSection.title: Understanding Trading Costs & Conditions

howPricingWorks.title: How Pricing Works
howPricingWorks.description: Spreads, liquidity, and market conditions can affect your cost.
howPricingWorks.details: Spreads vary based on market volatility and liquidity. During high-impact news events or low liquidity periods, spreads may widen temporarily.

leverageRisk.title: Leverage & Risk
leverageRisk.description: Higher leverage increases both potential profit and loss.
leverageRisk.details: Leverage allows you to control larger positions with smaller capital. While this amplifies potential profits, it also increases potential losses. Use risk management tools.

swapCosts.title: Swap Costs
swapCosts.description: Overnight financing costs/credits when positions are held after rollover.
swapCosts.details: Swaps are charged or credited when positions are held overnight. Rates depend on interest rate differentials between currencies and current market conditions.
